Package org.freehep.demo.graphics

Demo Application to show the export capabilities of the Graphics2D and GraphicsIO library of FreeHEP.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ExportDemo A simple demo of the graphics export library
SaveAsDialog A "Save As" dialog for saving files in a variety of formats.
 

Package org.freehep.demo.graphics Description

Demo Application to show the export capabilities of the Graphics2D and GraphicsIO library of FreeHEP.

@Status Stable.
